traits.name: Unsettling Visage
traits.desc: When surprised or made uncomfortable, such as by being examined too closely, the form taken by the Face Collector's shapechanging will begint o revert, yielding an appearance somewhere between the two forms.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.desc: The greater amont of time the Face Collector retains a form and mimics the actions of a creature, the more it adapts itself into the creature.  If the Face Collector retains a form for more than 10 days, it will fully adop the thoughts, behaviors, and language of the creature, adding it to a permanent repetoire of forms it has memorized.  Prior to this, the creature can only unsuccessfully attempt to mimic the language.  Once memorized, it will relentlessly seek to kill the creature it mimed.

actions.name: Grasp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.  Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage.  Upon a successful hit, the target is grappled

actions.name: Consume Thoughts
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.  Hit: 3 (1d6) psychic damage.  May only be used against grappled targets.  Upon a successful hit, the target is stunned until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Shape Change
actions.desc: The Face Collector can use its action to polymorph into a small or medium humanoid that it currently can see, or has memorized, or back into its true form.  Its statistics and equipment are also modified to match that creature.  It gains actions and traits to match the creature, in addition to its own, while in that form.
